lead_paragraph: Madison Avenue agency executives are always joining panels to judge the merits of each other's work. Now a panel is being, well, empaneled, to judge how well consumers do when they try to create commercials.
snippet: CheapTickets, part of Orbitz Worldwide, is announcing on Tuesday morning a user-generated content contest, asking consumers to create a 30-second commercial.

headline.main: Consumers Get a Chance to Go Commercial

abstract: CheapTickets, part of Orbitz Worldwide, is announcing on Tuesday morning a user-generated content contest, asking consumers to create a 30-second commercial.
